card.name: FORBIDDEN STAR ~World's Last Day~
card.text: ■ Cards that can be put into the Battle Zone at the start of the game ■ Your seals can only be removed when you summon a Darkness or Fire command that costs 5 or more or put it into the battle zone through ZERO once per turn. ■ You can't attack with creatures except commands, initials, or creatures that have "Forbidden (category) ■ This Final Forbidden Field can't leave the battle zone.

card.name: Final Dogiragolden
card.text: ■ Revolution Change: Fire or Nature dragon that costs 5 or more ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into their mana zone. Then destroy one of your opponent's Forbidden Creatures. ■ Final Final Revolution—When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you haven't used another "Final Revolution" in this game, your opponent's creatures that have power 1000000 or less can't attack you next turn.

card.name: Dormageddon X, Forbidden Armageddon
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ When this creature Forbidden Big Bangs, your opponent puts a seal on each of their creatures. ''(While creatures are sealed, both players ignore that creature.)'' ■ Your opponent can't put seals from their creatures into their graveyard. ■ This creature can't be sealed. ■ When this creature would leave the battle zone, you may put 2 of its Forbidden Core ■ If this card is anywhere other than the battle zone, destroy all creatures, then Alternate Loss Condition

card.name: Team Hamukatsu's Explosion Go!
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 3000 or less. :► Choose a card in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Dorbro, Final Forbidden Gamma
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy this creature.

card.name: Hamukatsuman Ace, Brave 1
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Revolution Change ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may take a multicolored creature, show that creature to your opponent and put it on top of your deck. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Dorhakaba, Final Forbidden Delta
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ If you have a field in the battle zone, you may summon this creature from your graveyard.

card.name: Dorta, Final Forbidden Alpha
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have a field in the battle zone, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Team Doremi's Light Spirit Go!
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. :► Draw a card. Then you may cast a light or water spell that costs 5 or less from your hand For No Cost

card.name: Noron Up, "Question 2"
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, draw 2 cards. Then discard 2 cards.

card.name: Ooparts, Last Question
card.text: ■ Revolution Change ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw 2 cards. Then your opponent chooses 2 cards in their hand and/or battle zone and puts them on the bottom of their deck.

card.name: Miracle Star, Time Caster
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Revolution Change ■ Blocker ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or when this creature is discarded from your hand by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of a creature, you may return any number of spells that have different costs from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Doremi 24, Miracle 1
card.text: ■ Revolution Change ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a light or water spell that costs 3 or less from your hand For No Cost

card.name: Wild Safari Channel, D of Great Revolution
card.text: ■ Whenever you tap a multicolored card in your mana zone, you may change the Mana Number ■ ''(Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard.)'' ■ D2 Wrap

card.name: Katsuking Jr, Kung Fu Generation
card.text: ■ Revolution Change ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down and break one of your opponent's shields.

card.name: Taiyaki Giant
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, untap 4 cards in your mana zone.

card.name: Beroringa M, Third Seed
card.text: ■ Revolution Change ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Platina Walsura S
card.text: ■ Evolution―Put on one of your water creatures. ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw 3 cards. If you do, discard a card.

card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Quattro Breaker ■ When you summon this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has no creatures in the battle zone, you Alternate Win

card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, put any number of creatures into your hand and put the rest into your mana zone tapped.

card.name: Demon's Light
card.text: ■ Draw 2 cards. ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -1000 power for each card in your hand until the End Step

card.name: Rainbow Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures and tap them. ■ Mana Arms

card.name: Team Tech's Wave Go!
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Return all your opponent's cards that cost 5 or less in the battle zone to their owner's hand. :► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 6 or more.
